def candy_game(candies):
    alice_total = candies[0]
    bob_total = 1
    a = candies[0]
    candies.pop(0)
    b = 0
    moves = 1
    while candies:
        temp = 0
        if moves % 2 == 0:
            if sum(candies) > b:
                while temp <= b:
                    temp += candies[0]
                    candies.pop(0)
                a = temp
                alice_total += temp
            else:
                a += sum(candies)
                alice_total += sum(candies)
                moves += 1
                break
        elif sum(candies) > a:
            while temp <= a:
                temp += candies[-1]
                candies.pop(-1)
            b = temp
            bob_total += temp
        else:
            b += sum(candies)
            bob_total += sum(candies)
            moves += 1
            break
        moves += 1
    return (moves, alice_total, bob_total)
